summary:
Simply install to Nexus MM or Mod Organizer.
Thats it.

You may take videos and upload them here if you wish, if you get into any epic battles, or simply exploration :)
descriptionHtml:
Check the videos section to check out the songs~

Battle:
Wardruna - Algir
Wardruna - Sacrifice For The Crops


Dragon Battle:
Wardruna - Battle of Brothers
Wardruna - Floki Melt Down
Wardruna - The Attack Begins
L.E.A.F - SUURIN

Exploration:
Wardruna - Bjarkan
Faun ~ Sigurdlied
Garmarna - Herr Mannelig
Jouney into the north (???)
L.E.A.F - VINDA Acoustic Ft. Helisir
Loituma Kun Mun Kultani Tulisi
Wardruna - Solringen

Night:
Heathen Harnow (Forndom) - Flykt (Official Music Video)
Sharon Lyons - Sacrifice
Stara Basn Soundtrack Gusla

Snow:
Wardruna - Ár Var Alda
Stara Basn Soundtrack Temat
Wardruna - Heimta Thurs

The dragon soul sound has been replaced also
(Trust me. Its better. Needed for the viking feel after an epic battle)

The menu song has been replaced with:
Bukkene Bruse - Miriams Voggelåt


Some songs have been cut, so that they fit perfectly. Such as intros, and outros.

Tags:

Viking Nordic Norse Scandanavian Nord Epic Overhaul Immersive OST
author: Avaze Zolhusky
